attributes.action: make David Heath MP Speaker of the House.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Heath MP should be the new Speaker of the House. In these current times we need a Speaker who is very recognisable, very constitutional and well endowed with character and personality and David Heath is that person.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
